import { Card, Button, Col, Row, Image } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import '../App.css' import { AiFillStar, AiOutlineHeart } from 'react-icons/ai'; import { FaShuttleVan } from 'react-icons/fa'; import axios from 'axios'; const Product = () => { const [chooseItem, setChooseItem] = useState(0) const [chooseStar, setChooseStar] = useState(5) const testCheckBox = ["Prayuth", "Prawit", "Anutin"] const [itemAmount, setItemAmount] = useState(0) const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { GetProduct() }, []) const GetProduct = async () => { axios.get("/product/getbyid/" + "61d581961bd9d464dcf721ff") .then(res => setProduct(res.data)) } return (
{product.product_name}
